profile: For over 40 years, we have helped Ontario homeowners and builders build safer, more energy-efficient and sustainable communities. With a broad range of products and services, we are your insulation experts for existing home renovation upgrades and new residential home construction—satisfaction guaranteed. Proudly serving all of Southern Ontario, we are Ontario's largest insulation company and are Energy Star and Foam Masters™ certified. Get in touch for a Free In-Home Assessment—contact us today to learn more.
products:
✓ Spray Foam (1/2 lb open cell)
✓ HFO Spray Foam (2 lb closed cell), 
✓ Cellulose (Blown and dense-pack)
✓ Fibreglass (Batts, blown and blanket wrap)
✓ Mineral Wool (Batts)
✓ Hemp (Batts)
services:
We install insulation throughout the home:
✓ Attic Insulation 
✓ Walls Insulation 
✓ Basement Insulation 
✓ Crawlspace Insulation 
✓ Garage Insulation 
✓ Floors Insulation

profile:
Innovative, Industry-Leading General Contractor in London, ON
Opal Building Co. is a construction company serving London, ON, with a focus on residential remodels and renovations. 
 
Our process begins with gaining a detailed understanding of the client’s unique wants, needs and design preferences. Our team stays up to date on the latest in building science, materials, codes and trends to inform our clients of important factors to consider when choosing a design. Some clients know exactly what they want, while others need help conceptualizing a new vision for their space from the ground up. Whatever the case may be, we offer a full suite of design services that can be tailored to suit your specific needs and budget.
 
Co-owners, Kevin Bartman and Tyler McIlroy, believe that a hands-on approach produces the best results. When construction begins, they are both regularly on site carrying out the work with their own hands to ensure that every detail conceived in the design stage is crafted to perfection. Ingenuity, modernization and efficiency define their approach to business management, allowing them to spend less time doing paperwork and more time face-to-face with their clients. With over 20 years of combined experience in a diversity of construction fields, the duo is poised to lead the most demanding projects. 
 
To book a free estimate, please contact us today at info@opalbuilding.ca or 226-236-3087.
Services Provided
Basement Remodeling, Bathroom Remodeling, Custom Home, Garage Building, General Contracting, Home Additions, Home Extensions, Home Remodeling, Home Restoration, Kitchen Remodeling, Porch Design & Construction

Areas Served
London
name: Opal Building Co.

profile:
KAMAK is a jointly owned and operated company by us, Joel Elliot and Garrett Huxley. Initially, we were both independently working in trades when we first met and realized what an astounding team we were together. KAMAK was then born in 2016, with a vision to produce unequaled, high-quality projects and workmanship that sets us apart as a company. With Garrett as a master plumber and Joel as a Red Seal Carpenter, we bring a well rounded level of expertise to offer.

We are intentionally selective in which projects we sign on with, to ensure there is adequate detail, time, and attention is given to each and every masterpiece that KAMAK has its name on. We team up with only high-quality sub trades & ensure that the client is completely satisfied each step of the way. Friendly and honest, sound integrity and experience are just a few of the ways we have been described, and we pride ourselves on that. 

We look forward to building a relationship with our clients and creating their masterpieces from start to finish. Excitedly serving the beautiful and prestigious areas of Byron, London, and surrounding areas, we greatly anticipate connecting with prospective clients and anticipate making their dreams come to life.

E&L Creations is a small, family-run business located in Mt. Brydges, ON. As a small business, our reputation is extremely important to us, we love what we do and we have the experience to get your job done right. So you can rest assured that we have a high standard in both quality and customer service.

We work closely with many licensed Tradespeople so you can relax and trust that we will organize and execute all aspects of your project and you'll only ever have to deal with one company!

We do everything from complete interior remodeling to decks, fencing and sheds!

profile:
RK Enterprises was founded in 2014 by Randy. Building on years of experience in various trades, Randy has always loved working with his hands, paying close attention to details and seeing how materials work together to create something beautiful. He also enjoys getting to know his clients and working with people every day.

 Today, the company continues to grow, with additional team members on board and a bright future ahead! 

When it comes to renovations, it’s hard to know where to start. 

You have a vision for your home but aren’t sure how to get there — or what company you can trust.

 

At RK Enterprises, we understand the anxiety that can come from choosing a renovation contractor. Choosing someone who understands your vision, does the job right and finishes on time can feel overwhelming.

We believe that the most important part of any project is a foundation of trust — something that we’re keen to build with you from the start. It’s also why we’ve put our company guarantee in writing, so you can make your choice with confidence.
